add.title: Add a new dashboard
add.name: Name
add.tooltip: The name of the dashboard should be unique
add.error: Sorry, you cannot use this name

remove.title: Remove a dashboard
remove.name: Please enter the name of the dashboard you'd like to remove.
remove.tooltip: Enter the name of the dashboard to remove here
remove.error: This is not a valid dashboard

removewarning.title: Are you sure delete this dashboard?
removewarning.description: If you remove a dashboard, it will be deleted and it will no longer be accessible. This action cannot be undone!
